entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
